00017 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 
00032 MTKt_status MtkUtcJdToTaiJd(
00033   double jdUTC[2], 
00034   double jdTAI[2]  )
00035 {
00036   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return code of this function */
00037   double leap_seconds[][2] = LEAP_SECONDS;
00038   double leapSecs = 0.0;
00039   int i;
00040   
00041   /* Find leap seconds */
00042   for (i = sizeof(leap_seconds) / sizeof(*leap_seconds) - 1; i >= 0; --i)
00043     if (leap_seconds[i][0] <= jdUTC[0])
00044     {
00045       leapSecs = leap_seconds[i][1];
00046       break;
00047     } 
00048 
00049   /* Make sure time isn't before leap second range. */
00050   if (i == -1)
00051     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT) 
00052 
00053   jdTAI[0] = jdUTC[0];
00054   jdTAI[1] = jdUTC[1] + ((leapSecs) / SECONDSperDAY);
00055     
00056   if (jdTAI[1] >= 1.0)
00057   {
00058     jdTAI[0] +=  1.0;
00059     jdTAI[1] -=  1.0;
00060   }   
00061     
00062   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00063 
00064 ERROR_HANDLE:
00065   return status_code;
00066 }
